day_1.activity: Rupashi arrives at JFK Airport, takes a cab to her hotel, and then heads to Times Square to soak in the vibrant atmosphere.
day_1.rough_prompt: A young woman with a suitcase, standing in the middle of Times Square at night, surrounded by bright lights and bustling crowds.

day_2.activity: She spends the day wandering through Central Park, enjoying a peaceful walk, and having a picnic on the Great Lawn.
day_2.rough_prompt: A young woman sitting on a picnic blanket in Central Park, surrounded by trees and the city skyline in the background.

day_3.location: The Metropolitan Museum of Art and The Museum of Modern Art (MoMA)
day_3.activity: Rupashi visits two iconic museums, immersing herself in art and culture.
day_3.rough_prompt: A woman gazing at a painting in a museum, with an expression of wonder, surrounded by famous artworks.

day_4.activity: She spends the morning shopping along Fifth Avenue and ends the day watching a Broadway show.
day_4.rough_prompt: A young woman with shopping bags, standing in front of a Broadway theater marquee lit up at night.

day_5.activity: She walks across the Brooklyn Bridge, explores the trendy streets of Williamsburg, and enjoys some local cuisine.
day_5.rough_prompt: A young woman walking across the Brooklyn Bridge, with the New York City skyline in the background.

day_6.location: Statue of Liberty and Empire State Building
day_6.activity: Rupashi visits the Statue of Liberty and takes in panoramic views from the Empire State Building.
day_6.rough_prompt: A woman looking out from the Empire State Building’s observation deck, gazing at the city below.

day_7.location: A cozy café in Greenwich Village
day_7.activity: She spends her last day in a cozy café, journaling about her trip and reflecting on her experiences.
day_7.rough_prompt: A woman sitting at a café table by a window, pen in hand, with a steaming cup of coffee, looking thoughtfully out the window.
